attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Newcastle Brown Ale is now not going to be manufactured in the North East
this is a tradition going back to 1927 not only is it a loss of one tradition but a long line of British traditions being lost
its about time this government stopped trying to be part of Europe WE ARE BRITISH SUPPORT US AN OUR TRADITIONS

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
